content.query:
CREATE TABLE #TableDetails (TableName VARCHAR(100),RecordsCount BIGINT,ReservedSpaceInKB VARCHAR(20),DataSpaceInKB VARCHAR(20),
IndexSize VARCHAR(20),UnUsedSpave VARCHAR(20))
insert into #TableDetails
EXEC sp_spaceused 'gold.SalesForceJsonData'

SELECT DB_ID() AS DB_ID,DB_NAME()  as DB_Name,b.object_id as Table_ID,TableName, DataSpaceInKB,RecordsCount,b.create_date
 FROM #TableDetails a
 INNER JOIN SYS.TABLES b on B.OBJECT_ID=OBJECT_ID('gold.SalesForceJsonData')
